sentence.Network_en: Her boyfriend is a good - for - nothing layabout.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的男友是一个一无是处的懒汉.

sentence.Network_en: The chap is a good - for - nothing.
What a good - for - nothing you are! You cannot take care of even such a trivial matter!
sentence.Network_cn: 你真是废物, 连这点事都不会干.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 饭字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 饭厅〖 dininghall〗 饭桶〖 ricebucket;good-for-nothing〗 饭碗〖 ricebowl〗.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(G) -亿城英语 ... good-fellowship 友情 good-for-nothing 废物 good-hearted 好心肠的.
废_百度百科 ... [scrap] 一堆破烂金属 [good-for-nothing] 无用的人 [put aside as useless] 废弃搁置.
英语词性转换 - 豆丁网 ... well-being（ 福利）； good-for-nothing（ 无用之人）； by-product（ 副产品）；.

list.abs: ※ Mojim.com　魔镜歌词网 ... 10.崩溃世代( Broken Generation) 11.我的废人朋友( Good For Nothing) 4.新歌三号( New Song No.3).
初中英语总复习_百度知道 ... good buy 价廉物美的东西 good for nothing 毫无用处的 good to the last drop 滴滴香浓.
读书——学习 - 英语翻译 -... ... eat,drink and be merry 吃喝玩乐 a good-for-nothing 酒囊饭袋 win universal praise 有口皆碑.

entry.def: If you describe someone as good-for-nothing, you think that they are lazy or irresponsible.

example.ex: ...a good-for-nothing fourteen-year-old son who barely knows how to read and count.
example.tran: 大字不识几个、数数要掰指头的14岁饭桶儿子

sentences.sentence: "the car was a no-good piece of junk"

sentences.en: Her parents have three children,but two of them are good- for-nothing.They rest all their hopes on her.
sentences.cn: 她父母有三个子女,但是其中的两个都一事无成。他们只好把希望都寄托在她身上。
